fact_check_explanation_title: Impacts of migration on local public services
fact_check_explanation_summary: It isn't possible to say with certainty what the implications of migration are for the cost, availability and quality of public services. They're likely to vary by area and service.

fact_check_explanation_title: PISA's international league tables: what they do and don't tell you
fact_check_explanation_summary: The Programme for International Student Assessment (PISA) is a survey of the educational achievement of 15-year-olds developed by the Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD).
